title: Level 1
body: Get to the goal by moving the player each turn. You can write a number into the boxes below

title: Level 2
body: Get to the goal by navigating the player around the walls each turn. You can write a number into the boxes below.

theoryBox.1: In programming, we can declare variables.

body: Get to the goal by navigating the player around the walls each turn. You can write a number into the boxes below.

title: Level 4
body: Get to the goal by moving the player each turn. You can write a number into the variable in the bottom right.

body: Get to the goal by moving the player each turn. You can write a number into the variable in the bottom right.
